response.address:hint: This field is only available for types other than `raw`.
response.hashType:hint: p2wpkh, p2wsh, p2pkh, p2sh, p2sh-p2wpkh, p2sh-p2wsh
response.redeemScript:hint: This field is only avalable when hashType is p2wsh, p2sh, or p2sh-p2wsh.
response.includeMultisig:hint: whether multisig descriptor is included in scripts stack

scripts.hashType:hint: p2wpkh, p2wsh, p2pkh, p2sh, p2sh-p2wpkh, p2sh-p2wsh
scripts.redeemScript:hint: This field is only avalable when hashType is p2wsh, p2sh, or p2sh-p2wsh.
scripts.key:hint: This field is only avalable when hashType is p2wpkh, p2pkh, or p2pk.
scripts.reqNum:hint: number of required signatures to solve multisig script.
